ValidationRule.description: Notes field required before editing any currency fields when Category is Other 1-5.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Other 1") || ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Other 2") || ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Other 3") || ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Other 4") || ISPICKVAL(Category__c, "Other 5"),
ISBLANK(Notes__c),
OR( ISCHANGED(Budget__c), ISCHANGED(Estimated_Cost__c), ISCHANGED(Last_Year_Actual__c), ISCHANGED(Next_Year_Budget__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a value in Notes field before editing any currency fields when Category is Other 1-5.
